item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Oh Lord, have mercy. It's the AT&T robotic lady reading a post. Dammit, no obscenities and only an excerpt. Not sure why only an excerpt; my feed does full posts ... unless, unless this is an evil plot to get me to subscribe.
WHY MUST THE GODS TORTURE ME SO?!?!?
Heh, thanks man. Got quite a chuckle from that and I'm sure my cult following will want to enjoy their morning commute with the AT&T lady reading AFK Gamer.
item.content:encoded:
Oh Lord, have mercy. It’s the AT&T robotic lady reading a post. Dammit, no obscenities and only an excerpt. Not sure why only an excerpt; my feed does full posts … unless, unless this is an evil plot to get me to subscribe.

WHY MUST THE GODS TORTURE ME SO?!?!?

Heh, thanks man. Got quite a chuckle from that and I’m sure my cult following will want to enjoy their morning commute with the AT&T lady reading AFK Gamer.

item.title: By: Chris Brooks
item.dc:creator: Chris Brooks
item.description:
Hi, I just thought I'd point you to an audio file from a recent AFK Gamer post. It's only 21 seconds long, as the RSS feed that I found only included post summaries.
This is the audio of a post entitled "Incoming. Lots." (sorry, no obscenities in this one): http://www.talkr.com/audio/a/f/k/g/42378.mp3
Thanks, Chris
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I just thought I’d point you to an audio file from a recent AFK Gamer post. It’s only 21 seconds long, as the RSS feed that I found only included post summaries.

This is the audio of a post entitled “Incoming. Lots.” (sorry, no obscenities in this one):
http://www.talkr.com/audio/a/f/k/g/42378.mp3

Thanks,
Chris
